text: *Child Theme Question* - Can you switch between multiple child themes and the parent domain styles within ONE CMS Site/Domain? Like it's not something that needs buisness units or add-ons, right? You can create 5 different pages on the same domain all using a different child theme, each, with no hiccups or issues? Is that correct?

We're a bit new to child themes and child themes are still pretty new themselves, so I'm just trying to make sure there's no quirky issues (like DnD areas) that will prevent us from delivering on the promise of the quote. Thanks!
That’s my understanding… just like there’s no limit on the number of active installed themes per portal.
have the two of you ever met? I have to believe you have. If not I think we should all get on a call together and have a beer!

Actually, even if you have, we should all get on a call together and have a beer.

<@U26BLKGE4> — <@U25C6PU56> has been an amazing resource to me over the past few years and I think the two of you would get along great and should def have a happy hour
Heck yeah I've met <@U26BLKGE4>! Always game for a zoom beer. Can't wait till we're doing dev days and inbounds in person again. Ah, those were the days.
I want to know how we get zero latency zoom call so that we could all do a little jam together, that would be a crazy crazy happy hour
